name: Unfeigned Depths
storyline:
You embody Adam, a loner living a seemingly normal life, running your own 3d printing business from your quaint apartment. Your life isn't much, but it's simple. Consisting of, weekly online therapy sessions and a daily work routine where you have a certain amount of orders you have to print and mail to customers.

At night, however, you transcend into your loving dreams to see Jinny, a girl you're infatuated with, the literal girl of your dreams. These dreams give substance to an otherwise boring existence for Adam. In his sleep, Adam feels something that is absent in daily life... Happiness. Suddenly, these loving dreams begin taking a darker turn. The illusion fades, and reality does as well. These dreams are indeed manufactured, but not by you.

As these dreams become more nightmarish, you'll explore in-depth environments looking for clues and unlocking new areas that lead to deeper levels of understanding what is happening, and why you seem to be the subject of focus. You'll be given opportunities to delve into multiple optional scenarios that bring forth more knowledge and information, but be careful. Some knowledge is not freely given, and the currency is torment. Combined items and information found within your dreams will equip you to unveil answers to disappearances of people in the real world and what significance they may have to the line between your dreams and reality has been fading away. Ultimately, discover why this is happening and who is the cause of it all.
summary: Unfeigned Depths is a narrative focused first-person psychological thriller. Through the eyes of Adam, understand the true nature of your dreams with fully voiced dialogue and dynamic events. As the lines between trust and deception are blurred, can you uncover where reality ends and dreams begin?
